text.name: Suppressing.
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp]
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count

text.name: Suppressing.
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [DefenseUp]
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count

text.name: Suppressing.
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [DefenseUp]
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +2
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/3) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] At 4+ [DefenseUp], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs: [WinDuelAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply 2 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/2) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] At 4+ [DefenseUp], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs: [WinDuelAttack] On 2 other allies with the lowest HP percentage, apply 2 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] On 2 other allies with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/2) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Fence
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [DefenseUp] on self (max 2)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply 3 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 8 [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the same amount of [Vibration] Count on target
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Fence
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 4)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [DefenseUp] on self (max 3)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply 4 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 8 [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the same amount of [Vibration] Count on target
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Zwei Knight's Greatsword Form - Guard
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Gain +5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]

text.name: Zwei Knight's Greatsword Form - Guard
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Gain +5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]

1101001.name: Begin Protection Mission
1101001.desc: At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)

1101021.name: Contract Target Protection
1101021.desc: Turn End: apply 1 [Agility] and 3 [DefenseUp] to 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage next turn

notes.short: {status:Aggro} tank that gives {status:DefenseUp} to himself and allies. Gains {status:Vibration} Count and consumes it to pass it on to his target.
notes.full: Gains {status:Aggro} and {status:Vibration} Count with his S1, S2, and defense. Consumes up to 8 Count with his S3 to inflict it on his target. His passive gives him {status:DefenseUp} based on his {status:Vibration} Count. He also gains more from his S1 and gives it to his allies with his S2 and S3. His S3 and defense trigger {status:VibrationExplosion}.
